alert.note: Alert for Benton; Mille Lacs; Sherburne (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mille Lacs, southeastern Benton and northern Sherburne Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 859 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Foley, or 17 miles east of St. Cloud, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Princeton. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 171 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
